mapper.insert: INSERT into logistics_order ( user_sign, order_number, ordering_products, send_mobile_phone, send_call, sender_name, sender_company, sender_address, sender_address_one, sender_province, sender_city, sender_postal_code, sender_street, from_place, destination, recipient_name, recipient_company, recipient_address, recipient_address_one, recipient_province, recipient_city, recipient_postal_code, recipient_street, recipient_phone, recipient_mobile_phone, transfer_no, freight, order_status, passenger_order, quantity_weight, weight, merchant_number, pdf_url, create_time, update_time ) values ( #{userSign}, #{orderNumber}, #{orderingProducts}, #{sendMobilePhone}, #{sendCall}, #{senderName}, #{senderCompany}, #{senderAddress}, #{senderAddressOne}, #{senderProvince}, #{senderCity}, #{senderPostalCode}, #{senderStreet}, #{fromPlace}, #{destination}, #{recipientName}, #{recipientCompany}, #{recipientAddress}, #{recipientAddressOne}, #{recipientProvince}, #{recipientCity}, #{recipientPostalCode}, #{recipientStreet}, #{recipientPhone}, #{recipientMobilePhone}, #{transferNo}, #{freight}, #{orderStatus}, #{passengerOrder}, #{quantityWeight}, #{weight}, #{merchantNumber}, #{pdfUrl}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )

insert into logistics_package ( order_id, package_explain, package_width, package_high, package_length, package_heavy ) values ( #{orderId}, #{packageExplain}, #{packageWidth}, #{packageHigh}, #{packageLength}, #{packageHeavy} )

insert into logistics_product ( package_id, chinese_name, english_name, specie, number, money, price, currency, specifications ) values ( #{packageId}, #{chineseName}, #{englishName}, #{specie}, #{number}, #{money}, #{price}, #{currency}, #{specifications} )
